QueryDefinition.Query:
with e_p as ( SELECT encid ,ep.provid ,provider_role ,specialty ,case when lower(provider_role) = 'attending' then 0 else 1 end as is_attending ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition by encid ORDER BY case when lower(provider_role) = 'attending' then 0 else 1 end, provider_role, specialty) sort_index FROM {sc}.encounter_provider ep join {sc}.provider p on p.provid = ep.provid ), e_p_filtered as ( select encid, provid from e_p where sort_index = 1 )
select e.encid, cast(replace(e.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, cast(replace(e.encid, 'E000','') as bigint) as VisitOccurrenceId, e.interaction_type, e.interaction_date, e.interaction_time, ec.provid, 'oncology' source_type, '' prov, '' provcat, '' pat_planid from {sc}.encounter as e JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND e.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE LEFT JOIN e_p_filtered as ec ON ec.encid = e.encid LEFT JOIN {sc}.visit v on e.visitid = v.visitid where v.visitid is null and e.encid is not NULL and e.encid != '' order by cast(replace(e.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
